HA6·3 | Ophiomancer | Card Text | Paragraph 1

trans-unit.target: Whenever CARDNAME attacks, exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn.

trans-unit.resname: HA6·5 | Laelia, the Blade Reforged | Card Text | Paragraph 3

trans-unit.target: Whenever one or more cards are put into exile from your library and/or your graveyard, put a +1/+1 counter on Laelia.
